about_the_game:
"Office Life" is a visual novel for adults only. A young IT specialist Jake is looking for a job and gets a good offer. His boss turns out to be a hot and seductive woman. He strives to conquer her using different methods, even the most daring ones.

A young but promising IT specialist named Jake Parker has barely graduated from university and is looking for a job. His good friend, Mike, offers him a job in his office - a vacancy has just appeared there. The only problem is a strict boss. But Jake never expected that the boss would turn out to be a hot and seductive young woman. Now he's obsessed with sleeping with her, but she's a Snow Queen, so it won't be easy. Especially when Jake himself is being actively harassed by a cute, but weirdo coworker named Emma. Jake will have to use all his charm to break through the armor of his sexy boss, and for this he will not hesitate to use any methods.
None at all.

Game Features:

Emotional Journey: The hero's deep emotions and complex relationships fill the gripping story.
Unique Characters: Each character has a unique personality, adding depth to the story.
Atmospheric soundtrack: The sound background and music create a mood, immersing you in the atmosphere of the story.
Unexpected twists and turns: The game promises exciting plot twists, keeping players interested.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters showing in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Office Life

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
